attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up with this spineless Goverment not being strong enough to do what the other euro unions do and that is to put our own people first ?????
We spend millions supporting other countries subs to ensure jobs in the uk why cant the goverment simple open our own industries keeping the pound here !!

I feel we the british are bombarded with euro legislation we are the only ones who conform to this

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
